name: Point Blank Vector (GMTK Game Jam 2018)
description: This is my submission for the Game Maker's Tool Kit (GMTK) Game Jam 2018! Keeping to the theme "Genre WITHOUT Mechanic", this is a Bullet-Hell style game WITHOUT the player shooting. Instead, YOU are the bullet as you charge your ship through oncoming enemies and their fire. How long can you survive with this unique twist on top-down shooters?
